title: Jordi's Day
description: A Gay Tale of Intrigue, Fantasy & Love in Barcelona.After ending a long-term relationship, Bill decides he needs a change. He finds it in Barcelona. Without knowing a soul, but with a work visa and a teaching contract, he moves there. Suddenly his life takes off. He falls in love with the city and with one of its hunky citizens. He’s never been so happy.Then people from his past show up and, as if haunting him, remind him that his freedom should not be taken for granted. At the same time, his boyfriend starts to withdraw. In a last-ditch attempt to keep his newfound happiness, Bill whisks his boyfriend away on a weekend trip, but when he returns, there’s been a murder and he’s the prime suspect.What follows is a story of love, duplicity, and survival. As Bill attempts to extricate himself from the clutches of death and of the law, he risks everything to get his life back. Along the way, he’ll learn some hard truths about life, love, and himself. The story features other characters that cannot be revealed here. As you read the book they will reveal themselves. One special character, however, shouts from every page. Barcelona - its culture, its language, its history - is more than the background to the story. In many ways, it is the star.[Gay, Romance. Mystery.]
author: Patrick  Doyle
